channel.title: JMenu reposition
channel.description:
I added a JMenu to the program im creating (released a basic version already.) It added fine and the buttons work, but its not in the place i wanted it. I added it by using this: frame.getContentPane().add(menuBar, BorderLayout.NORTH); But this is where the JMenu went. [img]http://i135.photobucket.com/albums/q147/eczema3/JMenu.jpg[/img]
The place i wanted it is between the textfield and the title bar.
